description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 50632/APP/2023/2313, dated 29-09-2023 (Erection of a single storey side extension, amendments to fenestration including relocation of dormer and upgrade of building materials. New front boundary gate) to amend the size and detailing of the dormer window structures and alter fenestration including design, enlarging the front ground floor window and side roof light. Internal amendments and minor changes to access levels and guttering.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans:
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020), and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, other than condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 50632/APP/2023/2313, dated 29-09-2023 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
